website_summaries.verdict: A great case for an affordable price. Protects the phone during everyday use, but for maximum protection, choose the Tough Armor.
pros: Features rubberized TPU with a matte finish, making the case easy to hold
It is not bulky and doesn't add extra weight to the phone
It also protects the phone if it is dropped
cons: The case may attract dust and dirt

customer_reviews.title: I like cheap stuff that works
customer_reviews.text: My wife has bought multiple expensive phone cases. She has dropped her phone multiple times breaking the glass. I purchase inexpensive cases and have never had my glass break. This one is replacing a case of similar price and design. The edge of the case rises slightly above the screen. This means when the phone drops face down, the edge of the case will hit and not the glass. This is an important part of the design, which I try to explain to my wife. If the case is flat to the screen, it isn't going to protect it when you drop it. An inexpensive case that is designed better than many of my wife's expensive cases.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection for my iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new Maxboost case for my iPhone 6. It replaces a rigid Maxboost case I'd used on the phone for multiple years but had recently fractured. The new case was easy to install but secure enough as to remain solidly in place. The case wraps around the face of the phone providing a raised lip that protects the phone face and its silicone composition gives ample cushion to protect from drops. All in all, it provides just what I needed in a phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Not shock-absorbing.  iPhone 6 screen cracked after dropping phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the slimness and feel of this case, but doesn't protect the phone from impact if dropped. I liked the case until accidentally dropping my new iPhone 6 from the height of kitchen countertop to the laminate floor. Fell on a corner and cracked the screen. Luckily I had a good screen protector (Tech Armor) to keep the screen from fully shattering.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Woman

customer_reviews.title: I had this case on my phone for 3 days ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this case on my phone for 3 days before my phone fell probably 5 feet and smashed. Picture of phone attached.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Strong iPhone 6 case
customer_reviews.text: Finding perfect transparent black and strong TPU case for iphone can be difficult task, but MAXBOOST made it easy for me with high rated customer reviews. The TPU material provides very secure grip with rubberized matte finish. Provides shock absorption from any drops or scratches. Very easy to put the cover on phone and to take off. The cover is lightweight and doesn’t not make the iPhone buffy. MAXBOOST provides lifetime case warranty which makes me rest assure.
customer_reviews.author: LegitBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Should have been made smaller, tighter, corners keep coming out. Scary.
customer_reviews.text: Like others have mentioned, this case uses silicone that is too soft, too stretchable, and thus its too big. Glad I ordered 3 different cases at the same time, as I had a feeling not all of them will be good. Wanted to like it, compared to other TPU cases I have bought for various phones. I'll stick to the spigen ones for now, even tho those are not perfect either. Or I'll have to keep looking. So the corners keep rolling off the round iphone 6 corners, and makes for a useless and dangerous case that will NOT protect your iphone 6 from drops. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: wew

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Love the thin protection
customer_reviews.text: Love the thinness of this case. Yet it provides great protection. With the added glass screen protector purchased and installed , this has got to be my favorite phone case! Must buy for those that don’t like bulkiness.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M.

customer_reviews.title: A nice looking case with a great texture!
customer_reviews.text: This case fits easily on the phone and provides a good amount of cushioning around the edges. It is transparent enough on the back that one can still see the Apple logo. What I like best is the satiny feel of the case which makes my phone feel great in my hand. Openings on the bottom fit most of the cables and headphones that I have tried. (One set of full-size headphones would not work in the jack with the case on, but all the ear-buds and car cables I have work fine.)
customer_reviews.author: Seth Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Minor Glitch
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for four months now ans it still works well. Protected my phone the few times I dropped it and saved my but many, many, many times when my battery was low. My only ulissue is that sometimes I am unable to turn on the extra battery without plugging it in for a split second. I'll push and hold the button over and over but it only activates when I plug it in for a moment at times. Other times, I can easily turn it on. Not that big a deal/problem. I highly recommend it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MissMegan

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little thicc
customer_reviews.text: This case is not ultra thin! Its really thick and my headphones dont fit so I constantly have to take the case off. It would be a great case if it was thinner like it is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: this case is exactly what I was looking for I have a Mophie battery case but it's a bit bulky on the iPhone 6 I needed an everyday case and this fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SGT G.

customer_reviews.title: oooh-oooh that smell...will go away
customer_reviews.text: Has a severe chemical smell at first that does dissipate over time. I set it outside in the sunlight and left it overnight. Can hardly smell now. Decent cover considering what the other guys are asking for theirs. No camera issues like others have suggested. I have the iPhone 6. Fits perfect. No issues whatsoever with the buttons or charging.
customer_reviews.author: caveman

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Fit to exterior of phone is good. The camera lens cut out is off causing the edge of the cut out to nearly intrude over the lens.
customer_reviews.author: rider

customer_reviews.title: Just "fine"
customer_reviews.text: I guess I expected more given the reviews. I was NOT given this as a free product. I paid for it. As a case, it's just ok. The sides have a little give when holding it - and it's just semi-transparent rubber. I can get to the buttons fine but have had problems plugging in headphones - hole is a little small. It seems to protect the phone fine. It's what I would expect for low price product but would not pay double digits for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cardenuto2

customer_reviews.title: Attractive case
customer_reviews.text: Lols Ike real quality, very nice case and seems to be holding up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: tvernstrom

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone 6/6S Case
customer_reviews.text: I have used this case with my iPhone 6 and my iPhone 6S for several years. I have dropped my phone, and it protected it. It still looks good as new.
customer_reviews.author: JiffSee

customer_reviews.title: Protection from scratches and scrapes not much protection from falls.
customer_reviews.text: Decent case with a slim profile but it is no Otterbox. Will defend against day to day scratches and scuffs but I still will hold my breath for falls on concrete/hard surfaces from waist height. The slim profile means that if the phone falls screen side down, the glass with take a significant hit. For that reason, make sure you pair this case with a glass screen protector! This case makes getting to the silence all button on the top left side a mild challenge, and taking the phone out of the case can inadvertently toggle it on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes it.
customer_reviews.text: It fits without modifying it. It is smooth yet easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyStach

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same case since the 6 came out and it's been great. After over a year it has started to become a wee bit more loose but very negligible. More importantly the narrow parts near the charger and ear jack have remained durable with no signs of decay. This may be the first case to outlast my phone
customer_reviews.author: Barry Hills

customer_reviews.title: NICE CASE
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on or take off. Subtle, soft, matte finish. Low cost, but it doesn't look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: ... to one I saw in a store and I like it better
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case because it was very similar to one I saw in a store and I like it better. The exterior is a soft matte plastic that doesn't collect dust or dirt. It goes over the corners and protects the camera just enough to keep the profile slim, but help keep my phone safe. The mint color is perfectly mint too, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Cass

customer_reviews.title: Good Inexpensive Case
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small light case that provided some protection and work with the WizGear system I previous purchased. This works perfectly. If you let your kids use your phone or a incredibly clumsy, this case may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Sarchet

customer_reviews.title: Bought for teen son
customer_reviews.text: Likes the price, color and quick delivery. Perfect for our teenage sons phone and pop socket.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystee A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Nice case with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: Nice case with a few flaws. Case seems to be built for the iPhone 6s because it does not fit the iPhone 6 precisely. When on the iPhone 6 I noticed a small amount of play and was able to shift the phone around in the case. Color is also more brown in the light then gun metal. Seems to provide good protection, but somewhat drab and plain.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: I really like the how the case feels
customer_reviews.text: Despite many of the negative reviews i decided to purchase this case. I really like the how the case feels, it's very smooth and easy to hold. This case does not make my phone feel bulky at all. Only downfall is that the headphone jack hole is too small and i cant use with my headphones.. other than that, i would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ressler

customer_reviews.title: iPhone Protective Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is very easy to install and provides two important improvements for an iPhone. First it does add physical protection for the phone which is very important if the phone is ever traded in for an upgrade . Second, the case ehhances the grip on the iPhone- the bare phone is somewhat slippery. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: This case works great and looks/feels awesome
customer_reviews.text: This case works great and looks/feels awesome. I gave it to my boyfriend when I upgraded my phone and he loves it! We both drop our phones fairly frequently, and neither of us have had any problems. This case does a good job protecting the phone, while looking sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.author: RCJ

customer_reviews.title: Expected more
customer_reviews.text: It is not any sort of protection it is just to avoid scratch
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Deane

customer_reviews.title: Sleek fit case
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sleek fit case. It has a nice grip and hopefully provides the protections should the phone ever fall.
customer_reviews.author: Aitchisonian

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it more than she's love me.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend and she doesnt want to get a new one unless its the same one. We normally switch cases every 4-6 months. shes had this case since the iphone 6 came out and it has held up very well. protects very well as well. will be purchasing again because happy wife means happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nova

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it !!!
customer_reviews.text: First, in the pictures it's clearly looks like it has an iPhone icon on it (why else is the icon brilliant?) - so there's no, it's just because the transparent! Second, the case just looks and feels much less elegant than what it looks like in the pictures. Also, in my opinion it goes out quite easily. I just feel cheated!
customer_reviews.author: Moshe Minster

customer_reviews.title: A great case!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't exactly what I was expecting but a great case nonetheless. Doesn't have the Apple logo on the back but the case is transparent where you can see the logo from the back of your phone. Very durable, pretty sure this case is indestructible!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack hole too small for most devices.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good and feel is fine. BUT - the headphone jack hole is too small. Of all my devices, only Apple headphones fit into the hole so the jack seated completely. Could not use my other headphone, or the car aux cable. Hope this helps. Check out SightLine Readers if you use reading glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Sightline Readers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case
customer_reviews.text: Very very thin but has relatively thick coverage around all of the edge and corners which is where you need protection. Perfect minimalist design while offering good protection. Many cases don't have protection around the buttons or plugs and this phone gets nicked there. I like the semi transparent black color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this case has been slowing down my iphone 6
customer_reviews.text: I know this sounds crazy, but whenever I use this case my iphone 6 becomes slower, and switching back to my older (lighter) it works better. would return if it wasn't beyond 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Yaakov Bekhor

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of keeping my phone safe. I’ve dropped it a couple of times from a height of about 3ft and nothing has broken. It’s not as dark as I thought it would be but over all it does what it was intended for.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY CASTANEDA

customer_reviews.title: Fitting case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my work phone. It has worked and fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hemz

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Place Winner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case with several others, but when I placed it on my phone and it didn't look good. I probably will never use it but it's well worth the money I paid for it. It has nice feel to it, so your sure but to drop your phone and it fits well too. I give it a 3 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: dlbutler922

customer_reviews.title: Dropped my iPhone 6 the other day on the sidewalk ...
customer_reviews.text: Dropped my iPhone 6 the other day on the sidewalk on my way to the newsroom. It bounced twice and landed (quite audibly) face down. The phone remains pristine. Well played, Maxboost. Well played.
customer_reviews.author: MelonieM

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, not slim
customer_reviews.text: Great at being a protective bumper case, not very slim form factor. I like the translucent look and the soft feel when you hold it. The cover is very steady and comes on and off very easily without scratching the phone
customer_reviews.author: Suitmonkey

customer_reviews.title: This one is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My son had this for months on his phone til he upgraded! It still looked phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: A. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price, functionality, and looks!
customer_reviews.text: This case does it all. It's aesthetically pleasing, has a smooth back, silicony finish, and the button protection/clickability is retained 100%. The only thing I would recommend is that the headphone jack hole be cut out a slight bit more, to allow for connection with larger sized jacks.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Right.

customer_reviews.title: Slim case
customer_reviews.text: Phone case is pretty slim, which is what I was going for. Can’t say how much it will protect my phone but worth it for the slimness. There is a bit of a lip so that should help too.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put on and it looked sleek and cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother and so far, he likes it. It was easy to put on and it looked sleek and cool. Looked exactly like I expected. Also, it you are a Android user that just switched to Apple, this case allows you to use your old android chargers.
customer_reviews.author: KianaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied overall
customer_reviews.text: Like some others have stated here this case feels a tad loose... But offer a decent amount of protection for a soft case. The buttons work properly and the case does not cover the edges of the display like in some other cases so it's really nice to the touch on the screen. The transparency is also pretty nice and stylish I dig it. I'd given this case 5 starts if it was a little tighter and not kinda loose. And I think since it's a soft case it could be a couple dollars cheaper as well.
customer_reviews.author: guimanara

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: got it for my mother she seems happy with it. she would definitely tell me if there was something she did not like about it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for sufficient case
customer_reviews.text: It inhibits the charging port just a little, so using some aftermarket lightning cables that have bigger tips can be annoying. Works find with anker cables and the OEM apple cables.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Harris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit the iPhone 6 very well and provides very little protection.
customer_reviews.author: meredith o

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this case for over a year now and it's saved my phone a good number of times. Case is nice rubbery plastic, which wraps around the sides of the phone so the screen won't touch the surface if the phone is placed face-down.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Fit N price
customer_reviews.text: I just wish there was a hole to see the apple logo
customer_reviews.author: R. Terry

customer_reviews.title: If you want your phone to fall out of it.
customer_reviews.text: A decent looking and feeling soft case, went to put it on and it was loose from the first time I put the phone in. I could shake the case and my phone would move slightly side to side. Not a very good fit at all. I ordered This brand specifically because the vibrance series case I bought for my note 4 was so nice and a perfect fit. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldozer1989

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Mine was so great for 2+ years I purchased one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Goodish case
customer_reviews.text: Good phone case just to have but if your looking for honest protection if you drop it slot look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: cassandra finucane

customer_reviews.title: nothing too flashy and I find this case really nice. nice thick layer of protective rubber on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a clean design, nothing too flashy and I find this case really nice. nice thick layer of protective rubber on the sides. feels good in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: toni_sto

customer_reviews.title: Priced right
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Just as good if not better that the $30 case
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special at all. Just a silicone wrap for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special at all. Just a silicone wrap for the phone, no screen protection. I lucked up a few weeks before and picked up an otterbox for 10 bucks. This was on sale for 8 bucks, but that's about all it's worth. Would never pay full retail for this.
customer_reviews.author: JustsomeReviewer

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 6 Flat Black Thin Skin Case
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and fits IPhone 6 very well. Color is flat black so any dust that does manage to get between the phone and case is not visible. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Not a slim case
customer_reviews.text: It is not a slim case and definitely increases the size of the phone significantly. I would recommend it only for people who need a lot of protection. I have used slimmer cases with equally good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Prat

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Opening for audio out cable a little too small. Nice case, easy in and out of pocket, yet provides enough traction that phone does feel like it about to slip away.
customer_reviews.author: R. Greene

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice, durable case
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, durable case. What I like most about it is that it comes off easily. Most of the phone cases I have are so hard to get off. This slides on and off with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Product is great - I bought it for an airline trip because ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is great - I bought it for an airline trip because I wasn't able to take my brass knuckles phone case. It went on easily - was simple, plain and comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Marina M.

customer_reviews.title: I liked
customer_reviews.text: excellent product adjusted very well to the phone, I liked it very much
customer_reviews.author: Miguel C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I got my case in June of 2015, andstill rocking the same case. Has worn slightly and gotten a little looser. But protected it over the years and through a lot. Side note, I am very careful with my phone and have had a screen protector on it ever since I got it. But everyone should do the same
customer_reviews.author: Kyle c

customer_reviews.title: Merchandise was delivered early!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order a day earlier than expected. The phone case works perfectly and I would highly recommend the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Audie W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sleek!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I came from a Spigen Neohybrid Metal and I prefer this case over the Spigen. This case is slim and has good protection. It feels sleek in the hands and doesn't interfere with my signal like the NHM case. Only reason I gave this case 4 stars instead of 5 was because the headphone hole is really small! 2 of my aux cables don't fit it right so I'm thinking I gotta widen the hole somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this case is perfect except for the fact that I thought this case ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this case is perfect except for the fact that I thought this case was going to be a light purple color, as seen in the pictures. It came out as light blue. Maybe I'm seeing it differently? But if you think you're ordering a purple case, it's actually light blue.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Slim
customer_reviews.text: Nice slim look and keeps the phone protected From scratching
customer_reviews.author: sonia araujo

customer_reviews.title: It's just a thin gummy case. The protection it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's just a thin gummy case. The protection it says it provides is a bit of an overstatement. Worth the price though.
customer_reviews.author: tcdragon

customer_reviews.title: Thin pliant plastic.  Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Not even a hard plastic. Very disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: NYCJORDAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Hard to switch on/off the mute switch. It’s a thick case and I apparently have thick fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kasel

customer_reviews.title: in the online and real is completely different
customer_reviews.text: in the image it’s look great. but when got delivery it’s worst than worst
customer_reviews.author: shekarreddy

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: I love it🤤 and tbh it’s really strong my phone fell about 6 times and it’s still intact

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, it literally keeps my screen from popping off of my phone. I also get a lot of compliments on the look, simple and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: PRVNU

customer_reviews.title: It's a good case. Doesn't fit the phone as snug as ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good case. Doesn't fit the phone as snug as I'd like, but it protects the phone from drops.

customer_reviews.title: never seen something that makes the iPhone look so ugly like this cover
customer_reviews.text: So ugly that I returned it, never seen something that makes the iPhone look so ugly like this cover
customer_reviews.author: HASH82

customer_reviews.title: I have already dropped my phone several times and worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: it is fairly slim, not too big but also big enough to protect. I have already dropped my phone several times and worked like a charm. Solid product.
customer_reviews.author: ebatiz

customer_reviews.title: My favorite phone case so far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite phone case so far. It is super slim and protective. I have dropped my phone a bunch and have not had any damage. also the rubber case is nice as its easy to grip and hold in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy if you want to use your headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Not even worth the money - my bose headphones you have to literally jam in, or fix them every couple minutes for them to stay engaged...
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color case but was quick to get dirty and fade. Used it for about a month and it was done.
customer_reviews.author: asilee

customer_reviews.title: Headphone hole has to be modified
customer_reviews.text: Good but i had to take a utility knife to the headphone hole to make it compatible with my myriad of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a good cheap case. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than similar higher priced cases
customer_reviews.text: Well made, My iPhone slipped right in. As good or better than similar higher priced cases.
customer_reviews.author: Mary from Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Seems like it’s a looser fit than I’m used to.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beaucheane

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit loose and thick but otherwise construction is pretty good. I know it will protect my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Case is a bit loose and thick but otherwise construction is pretty good. I know it will protect my phone though.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: feels weird on my hand. will not be buying another one
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Protects the iphone well, but not aesthetically pleasing, the corners make the phone look too big.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great feel in the hand. Just enough grip but still slips easily into your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Adams

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: perfect cheap phone case. I've had it for almost 7 months and its survived many nasty falls
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great case to protect your phone
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this case. It gives really good coverage. He drops his phone a lot and it has held up very well.

customer_reviews.title: Worst of all the hole for the headphone jack does ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a very snug fit, case slips, is bulkier compared to the Spigen case. Worst of all the hole for the headphone jack does not accommodate most headphone jacks.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I hoped for the color black like the description said.... Product color is dark tan? Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Slim case????? What a joke
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of phone cases, this is by far the bulckiest and weirdest of all. I do not recommend this case to anybody.

customer_reviews.title: real good for $$$$
customer_reviews.text: still looks new after a year of use in my pocket

customer_reviews.title: it is super loose and bulkier than expected
customer_reviews.text: my phone wiggles in this case. it is super loose and bulkier than expected. texture is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Great case, for the price I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great case, for the price I love it. My son has dropped it several times and my phone has not gotten any scratches on it
customer_reviews.author: jose saldana

customer_reviews.title: It sits in his hand comfortably and doesn't slip easily
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband for Fathers Day. It sits in his hand comfortably and doesn't slip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Summermom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's not going to protect from a direct hit to your screen, but a side impact you should survive.
customer_reviews.author: William J. welsh

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not that great in protecting the phone and the fit was a little loose on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Neon

customer_reviews.title: I've just put it on my phone- feels a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I've just put it on my phone- feels a little less protective than my existing cover. Otherwise a well made and fitting cover
customer_reviews.author: Shabnam

customer_reviews.title: pretty ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok... Stretchy but fits secure. Saved my phone when falling 3 feet... Not stylish.
customer_reviews.author: PM Prime

product_meta.title: iPhone 6 case, Maxboost [HyperPro Series] Premium Shock-Absorbing TPU Cases Durable Bumper Cover Frame, Matte Soft Anti-Scratch Finish Work with iPhone 6 (2014) - Transparent Clear Black
feature_bullets: STRENGTHENED PROTECTION - Strengthened TPU frame provides two-degrees of unparalleled protection for the iPhone 6 (4.7 inch)
SECURE-GRIP - rubberized matte finish adds comprehensive drop protection as well as ergonomic feel.
ADVANCED PROTECTION - shock-absorbing TPU body protects against, day to day wear and tear, scratches, scrapes, marks, drops, and falls.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES - include anti-dust finish, precision cutouts for all ports and buttons, camera flash protection ring, and easy-flex button covers for volume and power buttons for added protection.
LIFETIME CASE WARRANTY - from Maxboost to ensure maximum protection for the life of your iPhone.
